title: down sponge with rum and raisin ice cream
description: Fresh pineapple caramelised with golden syrup and butter, topped with light sponge, goes perfectly with rum and raisin. Make the ice cream a day ahead of making the cake for stress-free indulgence.
ingredients: 1 x 1.5kg/3lb 4oz medium pineapple, peeled, cut into 7x8cm/2.5-3in diameter, 1cm thick cored rings, remainder reserved (about 175g/6oz)
